Instruction: Combine flour, baking powder, salt, and sugar. Mix with milk until smooth. Divide dough into portions and shape into flat rounds about 1/2 inch thick on a floured surface.
Cook the dough in hot oil, browning each side until golden. Serve while still warm.

The nutritional value of oil for frying has been calculated based on a retention value of 10% after cooking. This amount may vary based on various factors such as cooking time, temperature, ingredient density, and the type of oil used.
